## *Network Data Structures and Sources of Network Data*
____

These lectures cover the basics of using matrices to represent networks. Fundamental concepts of graph theory are also introduced. Also, various sources of network data are discussed. Special attention is given to the [Prison Inmate Network Study (PINS)](http://justicecenter.psu.edu/research/projects/%20prison-inmate-networks-study-pins) and the [Boston Special Youth Project](https://jacobtnyoung.github.io/SYP-Networks/) (SYP) Affiliation data.
